HOME.TITLE: Welcome to MineZone
HOME.DESCRIPTION: MineZone is a classic Minesweeper game. Your goal is to clear a rectangular board containing hidden "mines" or bombs without detonating any of them, with the help of clues about the number of neighboring mines in each field.
RULES: Select a difficulty level: Easy (8x8) or Hard (16x16).
Click on cells to reveal them. If you reveal a mine, the game is over.
Numbers on revealed cells show how many mines are adjacent to that cell.
Right-click (or long-press on mobile) on cells to place flags on suspected mines.
Clear all non-mine cells to win the game.
CONTROLS: Left-click on a cell to reveal it.
Right-click on a cell to toggle a flag.
Reset button to start a new game.
HOME.ENJOY: Have fun and try to clear the board without hitting any mines!
